Message:
there are so many things
I’m thankful to you for...

and I’m not just
talking about this bear.

You’ve given me more than
I could ever ask for.

So I’m begging you...
Don’t say such a sad thing
like “Goodbye...”

I don’t want to go home to
an empty house anymore.

No one can get through to
a witch that’s gone berserk.

Because I know
that Big Sis is kind.

Whenever I was crying,
she would always be there
by my side.
come back to me, Big Sis!

I felt Mister’s staff connect
my voice with Big Sis.

“...Sol? Were you the one
who called out to me?”

A warm light starts
dissolving the land of ice.
